DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman , age 20 40 year Normal body weight height ( 18.5 kg/m2 < BMI < 30 kg/m2 ) Stable body weight ( weight gain loss < 3 kg past 3 mo ) Written consent take part study Agreement adhere dietary restriction require protocol Abuse drug and/or alcohol Use vitamin supplement contain vitamin K Soy allergy Pregnancy history ) metabolic gastrointestinal disease include hepatic disorder Chronic degenerative and/or inflammatory disease , e.g . diabetes mellitus , renal failure Use oral anticoagulant Corticoid treatment Subjects anaemia subject recently donate blood plasma Systemic treatment topical treatment likely interfere coagulation metabolism ( salicylate , antibiotic )
